title: Lead Engineer
bio: M.S. in Computer Science from Georgia Tech in 2012 with a focus in distributed computing technologies. Five years experience as a Java web developer, leading app containerization and microservice architecture initiatives at various startups. Love Indian food, hiking, everything Pinterest, and Game of Thrones and passionate about programming!

reviews.text: Amazing work on the microservices initiative, the CEO is very impressed with our progress and it's mostly your technical skills and leadership that's gotten us to this point. I know things are hectic but your work ethic is impressive and please keep up the great work!
